message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's my final offer.
